app_name: Hole.io for Android - Free App Download
about_section: Hole.io is an arcade game developed by VOODOO. The APK has been available since June 2018 . In the last 30 days, the app was downloaded about 9.3 million times. It's top ranked. It's rated 3.06 out of 5 stars, based on 1.1 million ratings. The last update of the app was on May 27, 2025 . Hole.io has a content rating "Medium Maturity" . Hole.io has an APK download size of 488.35 MB and the latest version available is 2.26.10 . Designed for Android version 7.0+ . Hole.io is FREE to download.
app_description:
Hole.io – Swallow Everything & Dominate the City!
Enter the ultimate black hole battle and compete to become the biggest hole in town! Move your hungry black hole, swallow buildings, cars, and even opponents to grow bigger before time runs out. The more you absorb, the stronger you become. Can you outsize the competition and take over the arena?
Key Features:
- Addictive black hole gameplay – Swallow objects and expand
- Real-time multiplayer battles – Compete against other players
- Time-based challenges – Grow fast before the clock runs out
- Custom skins – Choose your favorite black hole design
Download Hole.io now and prove you’re the ultimate hole master in this fast-paced, city-eating battle!
Recent changes:
- Added  a new currency "Skip It's!" that can be used to gain rewards and boosts instead of watching Ads
- Introduced a new progression system that awards you for eating the whole map!
- Apartment buildings in the city maps now crumble into multiple pieces
- Bug fixes and technical improvements

Development tools: AndroidX Legacy: Support Library core utils
AndroidX Legacy: Support Library core UI
Android Support Library Async Layout Inflater
